docs.title: Getting started ✨
docs.text:
Welcome to my personal wiki, where I store all my findings, manuals and so forth! When I learn something new, I’ll do my best to write it down here.

Browse in the nav bar to check up on my projects or use the search bar to find something specific :3

Consider visiting my personal website, or my Story hub! 😊

Info

If you like what you are reading and want something published here (or you want to write it yourself), just let me know on Discord or Github.

docs.title: LaTeX Math Support
docs.text:
LaTeX math is supported using MathJax.

Inline math looks like \(f(x) = x^2\). The input for this is $f(x) = x^2$. Use $...$.

For a block of math, use $$...$$ on separate lines

$$
F(x) = \int^a_b \frac{1}{2}x^4
$$

gives

\[ F(x) = \int^a_b \frac{1}{2}x^4 \]

docs.title: Mermaid diagrams
docs.text:
Here’s the example from MkDocs Material documentation: 

graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

docs.title: Text Formatting
docs.text:
You can have lists like this

  • first
  • second
  • third

Or checklist lists to

  • Get
  • things
  • done

Also, get highlights and strikethroughs as above (similar to Obsidian).

More formatting options for your webpage here. (but not compatible with Obsidian)
